title: Freezing Temperatures Leave Trump Confused About Global Warming | Chris Christie
itunes:title: Freezing Temperatures Leave Trump Confused About Global Warming | Chris Christie
description:
Ronny Chieng explains climate change as temperatures plunge in the Midwest, President Trump attacks his intelligence officials, and Chris Christie chats about "Let Me Finish."
